title: As a BOC Admin, I don't not want ebis to require Advance Consent attachments on Options or Outrights for 5+ players
custom_preconds:
Related to:
 - https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1202
 - https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1201
custom_steps: WHEN viewing an Optional Assignment tx or Major/Minor Outright tx
custom_expected:
THEN an attachment with a label type of "Player's Consent" is no longer required for submission of Outrights or Optional Assignments for 5+ players
AND The 'Received Player's Written Consent' checkbox is still required
AND On submission, ebis will return the following warning:
  -- Text: "By continuing you are confirming the player has a valid Advanced Consent in his UPC or the player's consent has been appropriately submitted to BOC."
  -- Buttons: Continue, Back
AND  - Clicking Continue will submit the transaction
AND  - Clicking Back will dismiss the modal and return the user to the unsubmitted transaction

title: Upload Frontier League Roster Data into Partner League Portal
custom_preconds: The attached spreadsheet contains the 2022 Frontier League Roster.  Thy should be uploaded into the Partner League Portal.  Matching logic should also be run if possible to identify any dupes.

title: As a R4 Draft Admin, I want to be turn off connectivity notifications for specific Orgs
custom_preconds:
AC:

* There will be an â€œAlertsâ€� toggle on each Orgâ€™s box on the R4 Connectivity screen
* These toggles will be connected to the â€˜Email Alertsâ€™ toggle in the header
** If the Email Alerts is turned on, all the Clubs' Alerts will turn on
** If the Email Alerts is turned off, all the Clubs' Alerts will turn off
* Individual Club Alert toggles may be turned on and off without impacting the Email Alert toggle or the other Club Alert toggles
* If a Clubâ€™s Alerts are turned off when the overall Email Alerts are turned on, notifications will not be generated for that club

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to indicate whether an Option should count towards the 5 Option Limit
custom_steps: WHEN BOC Approver is viewing a Preliminary or submitted Optional Assignment transaction
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new 'Counts Toward In-Season Limit' checkbox on Optional Assignment transactions
AND the checkbox will only be visible to BOC users and only be editable for BOC Admins
AND if the box is checked, the option will count towards the player's in-season limit
AND if the box is manually unchecked, the option will not count towards the player's in-season limit
AND the current year options field in the profile header will update appropriately

title: As an Intl Amateur Admin, I want EBIS to consume Intl Amateurs from IPL
As a BOC Admin, I want to manually remove a player's Substitute Player designation
custom_preconds: Business Value:  After initially selecting as player as a Substitute Player, the Club may choose to keep the player on the roster as a non-substitute player.  If they eventually choose to option that player, they are being forced to return him as a substitute.
custom_steps: WHEN BOC users view the Baseball Info section of the professional player profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new "Substitute Player" field added to the Baseball Info section
AND in View mode, values will equal Yes or No
AND in Edit mode, this field will be a checkbox
AND this field will only be visible to BOC Users and will only editable by BOC admins
AND IF the player is selected to the MJ roster as a substitute player, the flag will be set automatically
AND if the player is returned to the minors as a substitute player, the flag will unset automatically
AND if the flag is manually unset, the player will be able to be optioned without needing to return them as a substitute player

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Club Users to be prevented from submitting a MNC for a player with a Pre-Draft Physical that contains a signing bonus less than 75% of slot value
custom_preconds:
Business Value: The new draft rules require clubs to offer 75% of slot to a player that has agreed to a pre-draft physical.

AC:

* When a First-Year Domestic MNC is submitted, the system will perform a check to see if the player is has the Pre-Draft Physical flag set
* If the flag is set, the system will perform a check to confirm the Signing Bonus is at least 75% of the slot value for the pick the player was drafted with
* If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for club users and an overridable warning for BOC users:
** *Text*: This player completed a pre-draft physical and must have a signing bonus of at least 75% of slot.  Please contact the BOC.
** *Buttons*: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As a R4 Draft Admin, I want EBIS to consume the Player Name pronunciation file from DPL
custom_preconds:
AC:

 - EBIS will store these links and make them accessible through the front-end in a follow-up story

title: As a R4 Draft Admin, I want EBIS to consume the Pre-Draft Physicals flag from DPL
custom_preconds: The DPL API will have a new Pre-Draft Physical flag and ebis will consume it.

title: As a draft order API user, I want the draft order API to return a description field for all rounds
custom_preconds: In the R4 draft order API, if there is no "Desc" value in the rule4_round_order table, I want the API to return the "round_code" associated with the round.

title: As a League Economics user I want to flag cash from players to be named later on the payroll detail reports
custom_preconds:
Cameron has requested that any alternate cash payments associated with a PTBNL be flagged on the payroll - player details report until the pay by date listed for the payment - at which time the indicator would drop off OR the player is named, in which case the entire payment will drop off the reports.

In order to manage when the indicator shows in cases when they really don't want it to, we will also add a checkbox "Flag alt cash on payroll?" to the PTBNL row which signifies that the payment is not yet official.

By default the box will be checked and the indicator will display.  If the box is unchecked, the indicator will now longer show, regardless of whether the pay by date has passed.

There will be a footnote added to the report: "Cash payment is associated with a PTBNL and is still pending decision"

title: As a League Economics user I want a checkbox on the payroll tab to indicate if the contract contains a valley option or not
custom_preconds:
Currently the payroll calc decides on its own whether or not the contract has a valley option.  In some cases, it looks like it SHOULD have one, but really should not due to various, complicated rules.  To allow for users to indicate that there is no valley option we will add a "Override Valley Option" checkbox on the payroll tab of the contract.
The box will only show up if the contract contains at least one option year.  If the box is checked, then that will inform payroll calculation to ignore the valley option calculation and no valley dollars will be added to the CBT rate - even if they otherwise would have been.  If it is not checked, the valley calculation will proceed as normal and if a valley option exists, it will be added into the CBT rate.  By default the checkbox will be unchecked and the calc will proceed as normal.

title: As a CBT User, I want to see the Impact of a potential trade
custom_preconds: Wire: https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=projected_trade_impact&g=1
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Calculate, the system will calculate the impacts of the potential trade based on the parameters
custom_expected:
THEN the system will calculate the impacts of the potential trade based on the parameters
AND  the results will match the layout provided by the wire
 - There will be an Overall Impact table
  -- This will list the CBT and LRD impacts for each Club involved for each year of the contracts covered, there will also be a totals column
 - Each player in the trade will get their own collapsible section
  -- The layout of these sections will match the wire
AND IF the player's contract contains an Assignment Bonus, there will be an alert displayed
AND IF "Contract includes an Assignment Bonus [$Assignment Bonus amount]
AND IF The Assignment Bonus amount will be a hyperlink.  When clicked, the language from the bonus will be displayed in a modal (works the same way on the Trade Contract Info)
AND IF the player's contract will potentially trigger a tax rebate an alert will be displayed "Potential Tax Rebate"

title: As a CBT User, I want to enter parameters for a potential trade
custom_preconds: Wire: https://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=projected_trade_impact&g=1
custom_steps:
AC:
WHEN users are initially viewing the Projected Trade Impact Utility, users will see a Assignment Date field
custom_expected:
THEN users will see an Assignment Date field
 -- AND this field is required
 -- AND this field will be a date picker
 -- AND this field will default to the current date
AND there will be a Player/Trade To Org table as depicted
-- WHEN the screen loads, one row will be present with no information populated
-- AND the player drop - down will have the same population as the Active MJCs quick search
-- AND The field indicates the player/contract to be traded
AND the Trade To Org column will be populated with the 30 MJ Orgs
  -- AND This field indicates the Org the player/contract will be assigned to
  -- AND Both fields are required
AND there will be an Add Player button in this table
  -- AND Clicking this button will add a blank row to the table
  -- AND When all required fields are entered, the Calculate button will become active

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to be able create and submit Election per XXD transaction
As a BOC Admin, I want EBIS to treat certain players as if they were 5+ MLS as it relates to assignments to the MN Leagues
custom_preconds:
Description: Certain MJ players, typically foreign professionals, have clauses in their MJC that dictate they should be treated as a 5+ players and prevent them from being assigned to the Minor without their consent.

Some examples:
Merrill Kelly - ARI
Shogo Akiyama - CIN
Chris Flexen - SEA
Robert Suarez - SD
Drew VerHagen - STL
custom_steps: WHEN BOC or Club users are viewing the Misc section of the service tab on professional players
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new checkbox added to the Misc section of the service tab
AND this box will be visible to both BOC and CLUB users
AND this checkbox will ONLY be editable by BOC users with appropriate permissions
AND if checked, players will be treated as 5+ players when creating/submitting an Optional Assignment
** the Received Player's Written Consent checkbox will be required for submission
** if the box is checked, an attached file with a label of Players Written Consent must be attached for submission
AND If a player has this box checked, they will be treated as 5+ players when creating/submitting a Major/Minor Outright:
** the Obtained Players Written Consent checkbox will be required for submission
** if the box is checked, an attached file with a label of Players Written Consent must be attached for submission

custom_preconds:

AC:

* There will be a new â€œProjected Trade Impactâ€� tab added to the Major Contracts Dashboard
* The tab will appear after the Projected Payroll Impact tab in the left nav
* Clicking it will load the tab and display the â€œProjected Trade Impactâ€� tab
* The utility will match the provided wire
* As there is no saving or editing of information, and no visibility restrictions, there will only be one new permission needed for the utility

title: As an AMT Admin, I want age validation logic added to travel forms
custom_preconds:
Description:

MLB has rules that state players that underage players may not be checked into a facility.  AMT has logic that prevents clubs from checking in these players and generates emails notifying the BOC when the attempt to do so.  However, there is no logic preventing them from submitting a travel form for a player who is too young to be checked in.

Related to:

* [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISARC-6211|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISARC-6211|smart-link] 

AC:

* When an AMT user submits a Travel Form, the system will perform a check to see if the player will be old enough to be checked in on the date listed as the +Arrival Date+
* If the check fails, the system will return the following  message which will be a hard error for clubs but a soft error for BOC:
** *Body:* Player will not meet age requirements on stated Academy Check-In Date.  Please contact the BOC.
** *Buttons:* Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As a Player Programs Admin, I want a new end point created for Viral Nation
custom_preconds:
* EBIS will develop a feature to qualify persons requiring a Secure report and develop an endpoint for VN to fetch three data elements over a secure channel for those qualified person records. The endpoint will include EBIS Person ID, Name (First and Last) and Social Handle.
* End point will be secured and the user hitting it will need to have a new permission: EBIS-SOCIAL-MEDIA-API-VIEWER with a description of  â€œSocial Media API Viewerâ€�
* The end point will find all players currently active on a roster in ebis who currently have given social media consent and will fetch their information from BAM (much like we did in the FAMA batch)
* End point should be fast, if its not due to the need to make a lot of calls to BAM, we will need to prefetch the social media info on a nightly basis via ebis batch and store it in ebis table for quick retrieval - we could potentially store the entire JSON object per player to make things simple.  NOTE - this step will only be necessary if the endpoint is slow
* The results will be returned in the following format (example JSON attached as well):

{code:json}{
   "personId":12345,
   "firstName":"Example",
   "lastName":"Player",
   "socialMediaAccounts":[
      â€œhttps://www.instagram.com/accountNameâ€�,
       â€œhttps://twitter.com/accountNameâ€�,
       â€œhttps://www.facebook.com/accountNameâ€�,
       â€œhttps://snapchat.com/s/accountNameâ€�
  ]
}
{code}
